# RCSMessage.Content

**Enumeration**

An enumeration of the RCS message content types supported by the system.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Content
```

## Overview

The types that are associated values in this enumeration’s cases contain properties unique to their respective content types. For example, [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/Text] content contains a [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/Text/body] string, while [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/GeolocationPush] content has a [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/GeolocationPush/latitude] and [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/RCSMessage/GeolocationPush/longitude].

## Working with text content

- **RCSMessage.Content.text(_:)**: A content type for text content.
- **RCSMessage.Text**: A structure that represents text content in an RCS message.

## Working with file transfers

- **RCSMessage.Content.fileTransfer(_:)**: A content type for file transfer content.
- **RCSMessage.FileTransfer**: A structure that represents file transfer content in an RCS message.

## Working with geolocation pushes

- **RCSMessage.Content.geolocationPush(_:)**: A content type for geolocation push content.
- **RCSMessage.GeolocationPush**: A structure that represents geolocation push content in an RCS message.

## Working with composing indicators

- **RCSMessage.Content.composingIndicator(_:)**: A content type for composing indicator content.
- **RCSMessage.ComposingIndicator**: A structure that represents RFC 3994 composing indicator content in an RCS message.

## Working with disposition notifications

- **RCSMessage.Content.dispositionNotification(_:)**: A content type for disposition notification content.
- **RCSMessage.DispositionNotification**: A structure that represents disposition notification content in an RCS message, such as whether delivery succeeded or failed.

## Working with business messages

- **RCSMessage.Content.businessCard(_:)**: A content type for business card content.
- **RCSService.Business.Card**: Structure representing a standalone card.
- **RCSMessage.Content.businessCardCarousel(_:)**: A content type for business card carousel content.
- **RCSService.Business.CardCarousel**: Structure representing a card carousel.

## Accessing message content

- **content**: The content of the message.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
